section.section: The floors, walls, ceilings, sidewalks, furniture, receptacles, implements, and machinery of or in any food establishment shall be kept in a clean and sanitary condition at all times.
The design and construction of existing equipment in food establishments shall be accepted by the Department, if the existing equipment:
The Department shall establish guidelines for the replacement of failed existing equipment.

text.section: Any vehicle that is used to transport food or from which any food is sold shall be kept in a clean and sanitary condition at all times.
